item.title: Habemus composer!
item.dc:creator: Luca
item.description:
We have a composer for Blue Volta. After a long search for someone who would share our vision on Blue Volta, we can finally say that we found the right musician for the project. So we officially welcome aboard Paolo Giacci, talented composer made in Abruzzo. https://www.paologiacci.com Paolo is working on the score of Blue... Read more »

The post Habemus composer! appeared first on Ossocubo.
item.content:encoded:
We have a composer for Blue Volta. After a long search for someone who would share our vision on Blue Volta, we can finally say that we found the right musician for the project.
So we officially welcome aboard Paolo Giacci, talented composer made in Abruzzo.

https://www.paologiacci.com

Paolo is working on the score of Blue Volta since some time now and the result is exactly what we wanted, as he managed to blend his compositions with the atmospheres we are building around Zeno and his story.

Iâ€™ll leave you with a little moody taste of the Blue Volta soundtrack.

Luca

 

The post Habemus composer! appeared first on Ossocubo.
